item.title: Posts
item.description: I write these thinking that somebody might read them, so they have a little bit of polish.

item.title: Programmers: Stop Whining, Be Productive
item.description: Update 2019 10 years later, I have posted a reflection on this piece here I was pointed to Paul Graham’s post about programmers running on a separate schedule than other people.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: This site is build with Quartz v4, which is a static-site generator that transforms a folder of Markdown files into a website.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: Please feel free to get in touch! It would make me very happy. I don’t get a lot of views here, so I will probably respond very soon.

item.title: My AI manifesto
item.description: This is my personal manifesto for how I will and will not use generative AI.

item.title: What I'm doing /now
item.description: Personal Life Nothing much has changed for our family these past few years, and that is by design. Work is stable, life is stable, everybody is happy.

item.title: Farming Strategy
item.description: Laboratory 0 A lot of this information may be specific to farming on Laboratory 0. I’ll need to update this if mechanics change in the next event.
